tool_description: Categorizes and analyzes return reasons from free-text descriptions, identifying common patterns and root causes.

return_descriptions.description: List of return reason descriptions to categorize

use_predefined_categories.description: Whether to use predefined category taxonomy

group_similar_reasons.description: Whether to group semantically similar reasons together

language.description: Language of return descriptions: en, es, fr, de

include_sentiment.description: Whether to analyze sentiment of return descriptions

custom_categories.description: Custom category names to use instead of predefined ones

max_categories.description: Maximum number of categories to create (5-50)

exclude_patterns.description: Text patterns to exclude from analysis

case_sensitive.description: Whether categorization should be case sensitive

output_format.description: Format for category output: summary, detailed, hierarchical

error_messages: Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Unsupported language: Use one of [en, es, fr, de]
Invalid max categories: Value must be between 5 and 50
Invalid output format: Use one of [summary, detailed, hierarchical]
Empty descriptions: All return descriptions are empty or invalid
Custom categories conflict: Cannot use both predefined and custom categories simultaneously
usage: Provide return_descriptions to categorize return reasons. Configure categorization behavior with use_predefined_categories, confidence_threshold, and other parameters. Set custom_categories for domain-specific categorization.

category_distribution.description: Distribution of returns across identified categories

categorization_confidence.description: Overall confidence score of categorization process

insights_summary.description: Key insights from return reason analysis
